channel.title: Player is offline
channel.description: ok so i have a small but annoying bug in my client-when ever someone is online it says there off line-in the friends list-when ever there offline its says there off... how can i fix this? and please "spoonfead" me bcuz im new to coding!

item.title: Player is offline
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

No, I’ve gotten this error and didn’t put much look into it.
For some reason it looks like the client doesn’t see the player as “online”.

Read full topic

item.title: Player is offline
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

Spades:

go in your client’s client.java and look for @red@offline and there should be acouple of them, change them around to @gre@online, remember to only do it to 1 of them. Save, compile re-start your client, and keep on trying, eventually it will be the correct one.

I couldn’t find it…

Read full topic
